casebody.data:
Lucille WATTERS, Plaintiff in Error, v. HOME INVESTMENT & SAVINGS COMPANY, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 17, 1926.) No. 293. Leo Oppenheimer, of New York City (M. P. Kupfer, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Satterlee & Canfield, of New York City, (R. R. Hicks and Thomas F. Compton, both of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
